Package org.activebpel.rt.bpeladmin.war.web.processview

This package contains all the code and presentation beans for driving the web app Process Details view ui.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
IAeWebProcessStates Interface which defines the process states used by the web visual model.
 

Class Summary
AeAttachmentViewBean A simple wrapper around attachment viewable items make them accessable by JSP pages
AeAttachmentViewBean.AeAttachmentHeader Attachment header data used by bean.
AeBpelActivityObject Represents a BPEL "activity" as per BPEL v1.1.
AeBpelCompensationHandlerObject BPEL model for the root level compensationHandler.
AeBpelEventHandlersObject BPEL model for the root level event handlers.
AeBpelFaultHandlersObject BPEL model for the root level fault handlers.
AeBpelLinkObject Represents a BPEL link between two endpoints.
AeBpelObjectBase Base model representing an element in a BPEL definition.
AeBpelObjectContainer Composite pattern container representing a BPEL definition element which may have children.
AeBpelProcessObject Represents a BPEL process.
AeBpelScopeObject Represents a web visual model for a BPEL scope activity.
AeBpelTerminationHandlerObject BPEL model for the root level terminationHandler.
AeJsTreeBuilder This class generates the Java Script needed to display a Tree View control.
AeProcessDefToWebModelVisitor Visitor responsible for building the web visual model by visiting the BPEL definitions.
AeProcessDefToWebStateModelVisitor Visitor responsible for building the web visual model and its state by visiting the BPEL definitions.
AeProcessDefToWebVisitorBase Base visitor responsible for building the web visual model or definition properties.
AeProcessViewBase Base class for used by the presentation beans responsible for displaying process details.
AeProcessViewBean This bean is responsible for providing BPEL activity attribute data as well as other details (when applicable) such as variable state information.
AeProcessViewButtonStates Utility class for determining the button states for the various control buttons in the process viewer.
AeProcessViewImageResources A utility class used to map BPEL element names to its corresponding image filename.
AeProcessViewPropertyBuilder This class is responsible for building the list of properties to be displayed by the AePropertViewBean.
AeProcessViewUtil Contains convienience methods to load a XML Document object.
AeProcessWebPropertyBuilder Base class which builds the properties for the selected BPEL activity in the admin console.
AePropertyNameValue A simple wrapper aound name:value (key:value) sets.
AeWebBpelProcessLoader Class to load the BPEL process definition object given the denition xml.
 

Package org.activebpel.rt.bpeladmin.war.web.processview Description

This package contains all the code and presentation beans for driving the web app Process Details view ui.
